ITEM.OPER: select a.*,b.description from utap.DONE_TASK a left join utap.task_template b on a.task_template_id = b.task_template_id --where result_code <> 0 and result_code <> 2008 --where a.task_id like '220%' where b.TASK_TEMPLATE_ID in(1800697) --and b.description not like '%CUB%' --AND b.description like '%分析%' --and b.description not like '%营销管理%' --and substr(a.task_id,8,8) = '20140508' -- and result_code <> 2008 --and result_code = 0 order by a.TASK_RUN_END_TIME desc fetch first 300 rows only with ur
ITEM.OPER_DESC: select a.*,b.description from utap.DONE_TASK a left join utap.task_template b on a.task_template_id = b.task_template_id --where result_code <> 0 and result_code <> 2008 --where a.task_id like '220%' where b.TASK_TEMPLATE_ID in(1800697) --and b.description not like '%CUB%' --AND b.description like '%分析%' --and b.description not like '%营销管理%' --and substr(a.task_id,8,8) = '20140508' -- and result_code <> 2008 --and result_code = 0 order by a.TASK_RUN_END_TIME desc fetch first 300 rows only with ur
